messages.messageBody:
Title: Miburo Island: The Tale of a Bakumatsu Castaway
Author: MissBehavin (under user name toshizo)
E-mail: Warg3791@...
Source: Drawn from several sources, including historical, but using
PMK pics. (Entertainment sources include PMK, NHK, and Shin Kepp.)
Main Characters: Hijikata Toshizo
Archived on the website: no
General Rating: Will vary from post to post. Should not be higher
than an R.
Warning: Nothing as of yet, but that will vary from post to post
Disclaimer: While this is my version of the character and I draw as
much as possible on historical sources, I do also draw a considerable
amount of inspiration from the above listed sources. I do not own
PMK, NHK, or Shin Kepp. Nor do I own any of the pics used in the fic.


Summary - Hijikata gets stranded on an island in the middle of
nowhere and soon discovers the natives are crazy. And then there is
that monkey...

This story is not located here at SHQ Spy Division. It is being
written from post to post in a community on LiveJournal.
http://www.livejournal.com/community/miburo_island/
